official_title: ESPBs Vs TAPs for Satisfactory Analgesia Following DIEP Surgery
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult women with breast cancer, ASA 1-3, undergoing DIEP flap surgery
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Chronic opioid use contraindications to local anesthetics or regional analgesia Inability to communicate intensity of pain on a numeric analog scale
